name: Meryon Woods
description:
As one of the Baron's Irregulars, you take on the missions that no one else can or will. This one, though? Deliver a message to the nearby abbey? Wander through Meryon Woods? No harm could surely befall you.

Find out in this solo adventure for the Dragon Warriors RPG. Suitable for any profession. This is advised for a 2nd rank character.

Written and Illustrated by Nigel Ward.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
